title: How do you upload your own files into a post?
body:
Sorry for the menial post, but yeah: Was wondering how you can add your own files into a post. I wanted to add a picture I had made to the post but wasn't sure how to go about it.

Also, was wondering: How do you centralise text in a post or change it's font size?

Thanks for any help you can offer!

replies.body:
If you need to include an image in your post, you can use any image links that end in .png or .jpg and they should show up as the picture in your post. For example, "http://i.imgur.com/13KyxKe".jpg without the quote's gives you 

http://i.imgur.com/13KyxKe.jpg

You can also check out our [**Boards Formatting 101**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101) post for other neat ways you can customize your posts!
Awesome thanks for the hand! It helps a lot, so cheers. I'll make sure to go check out that board's post on formatting, might come in serious handy. Thanks again!
All in a good days job ^_^{{summoner:31}}
